mantras.title: Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: One of the most popular and ancient mantras from the Rig Veda dedicated to Savitr, the sun deity
mantras.text: ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्।
mantras.translation: We meditate on the glory of the Creator; Who has created the Universe; Who is worthy of worship; Who is the embodiment of Knowledge and Light; Who is the remover of all sins and ignorance; May He enlighten our intellect.

mantras.title: Om Namah Shivaya
mantras.description: A popular and powerful mantra dedicated to Lord Shiva
mantras.text: ॐ नमः शिवाय
mantras.translation: I bow to Shiva (the Supreme Being)

mantras.title: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra
mantras.description: A life-giving mantra dedicated to Lord Shiva that is said to rejuvenate, bestow health, wealth, peace, and ward off untimely death
mantras.text: ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम् उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्
mantras.translation: We worship the Three-eyed Lord (Shiva) who is fragrant and who nourishes all beings. May He liberate us from the bondage of death, like a cucumber is severed from its bondage (to the creeper). May we be set free for the sake of immortality.

mantras.title: Hare Krishna Maha Mantra
mantras.description: A 16-word Vaishnava mantra that is mentioned in multiple Puranas and popularized by Chaitanya Mahaprabhu
mantras.text: हरे कृष्ण हरे कृष्ण कृष्ण कृष्ण हरे हरे। हरे राम हरे राम राम राम हरे हरे॥
mantras.translation: O Lord Krishna, O Lord Krishna, O energy of the Lord, please engage me in Your service.

mantras.title: Ganesh Mantra
mantras.description: A powerful mantra dedicated to Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles
mantras.text: वक्रतुण्ड महाकाय सूर्यकोटि समप्रभ। निर्विघ्नं कुरु मे देव सर्वकार्येषु सर्वदा॥
mantras.translation: O Lord with the curved trunk and massive body, the one whose brilliance equals that of a million suns, always bless me so that there are no obstacles in my endeavors.

mantras.title: Shanti Mantra
mantras.description: A universal peace mantra from the Upanishads
mantras.text: ॐ सह नाववतु। सह नौ भुनक्तु। सह वीर्यं करवावहै। तेजस्वि नावधीतमस्तु। मा विद्विषावहै। ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः॥
mantras.translation: May we be protected together. May we be nourished together. May we work together with great vigor. May our study be enlightening. May no obstacle arise between us. Om peace, peace, peace.

mantras.title: Durga Mantra
mantras.description: A powerful mantra dedicated to Goddess Durga
mantras.text: ॐ दुं दुर्गायै नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Goddess Durga.

mantras.title: Hanuman Chalisa
mantras.description: A 40-verse devotional composition dedicated to Lord Hanuman
mantras.text: ॥ दोहा ॥ श्रीगुरु चरन सरोज रज निज मनु मुकुरु सुधारि। बरनऊँ रघुबर बिमल जसु जो दायकु फल चारि॥ बुद्धिहीन तनु जानिके सुमिरौं पवन-कुमार। बल बुधि बिद्या देहु मोहिं हरहु कलेस बिकार॥
mantras.translation: Cleansing the mirror of my mind with the dust of my Guru's lotus feet. I shall narrate the pure fame of the best of Raghus which bestows the four-fold fruits of life. Knowing that this body is devoid of intelligence, I remember Hanuman, the son of the Wind-god. Give me strength, wisdom and knowledge, removing my shortcomings and evils.

mantras.title: Saraswati Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Goddess Saraswati, the deity of knowledge, music, arts, and wisdom
mantras.text: या कुन्देन्दुतुषारहारधवला या शुभ्रवस्त्रावृता या वीणावरदण्डमण्डितकरा या श्वेतपद्मासना या ब्रह्माच्युतशङ्करप्रभृतिभिर्देवैः सदा वन्दिता सा मां पातु सरस्वती भगवती निःशेषजाड्यापहा॥
mantras.translation: May Goddess Saraswati, who is fair like the jasmine-colored moon and whose pure white garland is like frosty dew drops; who is adorned in radiant white attire, on whose hand rests the veena, and whose throne is a white lotus; who is surrounded and respected by the Gods Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva; protect me. May you fully remove my lethargy, sluggishness, and ignorance.

mantras.title: Lakshmi Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi, the Hindu goddess of wealth, fortune, and prosperity
mantras.text: ॐ श्रीं ह्रीं श्रीं कमले कमलालये प्रसीद प्रसीद श्रीं ह्रीं श्रीं ॐ महालक्ष्म्यै नमः
mantras.translation: Om Shreem Hreem Shreem Kamale Kamalaalaye Praseed Praseed Shreem Hreem Shreem Om Mahalakshmi Namaha.

mantras.title: Surya Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Surya, the solar deity
mantras.text: ॐ घृणिः सूर्यादित्यो'म्।
mantras.translation: Om, Surya, the luminous, the sun, the brilliant light.

mantras.title: Vishnu Sahasranama
mantras.description: A list of 1,000 names of Vishnu, one of the principal deities of Hinduism
mantras.text: ॐ विश्वं विष्णुर्वषट्कारो भूतभव्यभवत्प्रभुः। भूतकृद्भूतभृद्भावो भूतात्मा भूतभावनः॥
mantras.translation: Om, Vishnu is the universe. He is the embodiment of the sacrificial mantras. He is the Lord of past, present, and future. He is the creator and sustainer of all beings. He is the soul of all beings. He is the cause of all beings.

mantras.title: Navagraha Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra to appease the nine planetary deities in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: आदित्याय च सोमाय मंगलाय बुधाय च। गुरु शुक्र शनिभ्यश्च राहवे केतवे नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to the Sun, the Moon, Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus, Saturn, Rahu, and Ketu.

mantras.title: Aditya Hridayam
mantras.description: A powerful hymn dedicated to Surya, the Sun God, as narrated by sage Agastya to Lord Rama
mantras.text: ततो युद्धपरिश्रान्तं समरे चिन्तया स्थितम्। रावणं चाग्रतो दृष्ट्वा युद्धाय समुपस्थितम्॥
mantras.translation: The sage Agastya narrated this to Lord Rama when he was tired from battle and saw Ravana standing before him ready for war.

mantras.title: Rudra Namakam
mantras.description: A sacred hymn from the Krishna Yajurveda dedicated to Rudra (Lord Shiva)
mantras.text: ॐ नमो भगवते रुद्राय
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Rudra, the auspicious one.

mantras.title: Rama Raksha Stotra
mantras.description: A protective prayer to Lord Rama composed by sage Budha Kaushika
mantras.text: श्रीरामरक्षास्तोत्रं भजतां कामदं सदा। साप्तर्ष्यमुखनिर्याताया महेश्वरप्रसादिताम्॥
mantras.translation: This Rama Raksha Stotra always fulfills the desires of those who recite it. It emerged from the mouth of the seven sages and was blessed by Lord Shiva.

mantras.title: Shiva Tandava Stotram
mantras.description: A powerful hymn that describes the dance of Lord Shiva and his power
mantras.text: जटाटवीगलज्जलप्रवाहपावितस्थले गलेऽवलम्ब्य लम्बितां भुजङ्गतुङ्गमालिकाम्।
mantras.translation: From the forests of matted locks on Shiva's head, the river Ganga flows and sanctifies his neck, where serpents hang like garlands.

mantras.title: Kanakadhara Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn composed by Adi Shankaracharya dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi
mantras.text: अङ्गं हरेः पुलकभूषणमाश्रयन्ती भृङ्गाङ्गनेव मुकुलाभरणं तमालम्।
mantras.translation: She who resides on the body of Lord Vishnu, beautifying it with her presence, like a female bee adorning a blooming Tamala tree.

mantras.title: Ashtalakshmi Stotram
mantras.description: A prayer to the eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi
mantras.text: अधिलक्ष्मी महालक्ष्मी सर्वलक्ष्मी जयाधिकाम्। धनलक्ष्मी धान्यलक्ष्मी धैर्यलक्ष्मी शुभप्रदाम्॥
mantras.translation: I worship the eight forms of Lakshmi: Adhi Lakshmi, Maha Lakshmi, Sarva Lakshmi, Jaya Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhanya Lakshmi, Dhairya Lakshmi, and Shubha Lakshmi.

mantras.title: Lingashtakam
mantras.description: An eight-verse hymn dedicated to the Shiva Linga
mantras.text: ब्रह्मामुरारिसुरार्चितलिङ्गं निर्मलभासितशोभितलिङ्गम्। जन्मजदुःखविनाशकलिङ्गं तत्प्रणमामि सदाशिवलिङ्गम्॥
mantras.translation: I bow to that Sadashiva Linga, which is adored by Brahma, Vishnu, and other gods, which is pure and resplendent, and which destroys the cycle of births and deaths.

mantras.title: Purusha Suktam
mantras.description: A hymn from the Rigveda that describes the cosmic being
mantras.text: सहस्रशीर्षा पुरुषः सहस्राक्षः सहस्रपात्। स भूमिं विश्वतो वृत्वा अत्यतिष्ठद्दशाङ्गुलम्॥
mantras.translation: The Purusha has a thousand heads, a thousand eyes, and a thousand feet. He pervades the earth on all sides and extends beyond it by ten fingers' length.

mantras.title: Sri Suktam
mantras.description: A hymn from the Rigveda dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi
mantras.text: हिरण्यवर्णां हरिणीं सुवर्णरजतस्रजाम्। चन्द्रां हिरण्मयीं लक्ष्मीं जातवेदो म आ वह॥
mantras.translation: O Jatavedas (Fire god), bring to me that Goddess Lakshmi who shines like gold, who is golden and silvery in hue, who wears gold and silver ornaments, who is radiant like the moon, and who is the embodiment of wealth.

mantras.title: Ganesha Pancharatnam
mantras.description: A five-verse hymn dedicated to Lord Ganesha, composed by Adi Shankaracharya
mantras.text: मुदाकरात्त मोदकं सदा विमुक्ति साधकं कलाधराव तंसकं विलासि लोक रक्षकम्।
mantras.translation: I bow to the lotus-feet of Ganesha, who holds a modaka (sweet) in his hand, who is the bestower of liberation, who wears the moon on his forehead, and who protects the world.

mantras.title: Narayana Suktam
mantras.description: A hymn from the Yajurveda dedicated to Lord Narayana
mantras.text: सहस्रशीर्षं देवं विश्वाक्षं विश्वशम्भुवम्। विश्वं नारायणं देवमक्षरं परमं पदम्॥
mantras.translation: The Lord has thousands of heads, eyes, and feet. He is the foundation of the universe, the Lord Narayana, eternal and supreme.

mantras.title: Aditya Hridayam
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to Surya, the Sun God, from the Yuddha Kanda of Ramayana
mantras.text: नमः पूर्वाय गिरये पश्चिमायाद्रये नमः। ज्योतिर्गणानां पतये दिनाधिपतये नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to the eastern mountain (where the sun rises) and to the western mountain (where the sun sets). Salutations to the lord of the luminaries, to the lord of the day.

mantras.title: Devi Mahatmyam
mantras.description: Also known as Durga Saptashati, a text describing the victory of Goddess Durga over the demon Mahishasura
mantras.text: या देवी सर्वभूतेषु शक्तिरूपेण संस्थिता। नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमस्तस्यै नमो नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations again and again to the Devi who abides in all beings in the form of power.

mantras.title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 2, Verse 47
mantras.description: The famous verse from the Bhagavad Gita that speaks about focusing on action without attachment to results
mantras.text: कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन। मा कर्मफलहेतुर्भूर्मा ते सङ्गोऽस्त्वकर्मणि॥
mantras.translation: You have a right to perform your prescribed duties, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions. Never consider yourself to be the cause of the results of your activities, and never be attached to not doing your duty.

mantras.title: Dakshinamurthy Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn composed by Adi Shankaracharya dedicated to Lord Shiva in his aspect as Dakshinamurthy, the supreme teacher
mantras.text: विश्वं दर्पणदृश्यमाननगरीतुल्यं निजान्तर्गतं पश्यन्नात्मनि मायया बहिरिवोद्भूतं यथा निद्रया।
mantras.translation: The universe is like a city reflected in a mirror. One sees it within oneself due to Maya, just as one might see a dream world while asleep.

mantras.title: Nirvana Shatakam
mantras.description: A composition by Adi Shankaracharya that describes the nature of the soul
mantras.text: मनोबुद्ध्यहङ्कार चित्तानि नाहं न च श्रोत्रजिह्वे न च घ्राणनेत्रे। न च व्योम भूमिर्न तेजो न वायुः चिदानन्दरूपः शिवोऽहम् शिवोऽहम्॥
mantras.translation: I am not the mind, intellect, ego, or memory. I am not the ears, tongue, nose, or eyes. I am not space, earth, fire, or air. I am the form of consciousness and bliss. I am Shiva, I am Shiva.

mantras.title: Shiv Mahimna Stotra
mantras.description: A stotra (hymn) composed by Pushpadanta in praise of Lord Shiva
mantras.text: महिम्नः पारं ते परमविदुषो यद्यसदृशी स्तुतिर्ब्रह्मादीनामपि तदवसन्नास्त्वयि गिरः।
mantras.translation: Even the greatest scholars cannot fully comprehend the extent of your glory. If the praises sung by Brahma and other gods are inadequate, then what can my words do?

mantras.title: Soundarya Lahari
mantras.description: A text by Adi Shankaracharya dedicated to Goddess Parvati
mantras.text: शिवः शक्त्या युक्तो यदि भवति शक्तः प्रभवितुम् न चेदेवं देवो न खलु कुशलः स्पन्दितुमपि।
mantras.translation: Only when Shiva is united with Shakti does he have the power to create. Without her, even the god cannot move.

mantras.title: Bhaja Govindam
mantras.description: A devotional composition by Adi Shankaracharya emphasizing the importance of devotion to Lord Govinda (Krishna)
mantras.text: भज गोविन्दं भज गोविन्दं गोविन्दं भज मूढमते। सम्प्राप्ते सन्निहिते काले नहि नहि रक्षति डुकृञ्करणे॥
mantras.translation: Worship Govinda, worship Govinda, worship Govinda, O fool. When death approaches, rules of grammar will not save you.

mantras.title: Chamakam
mantras.description: A prayer from the Krishna Yajurveda that asks for material and spiritual blessings
mantras.text: अग्ना विष्णू सजोषसेमा वर्धन्तु वां गिरः। द्युम्नैर्वाजेभिरागतम्॥
mantras.translation: May these prayers please Agni and Vishnu. May they come to us with wealth and food.

mantras.title: Narasimha Kavacham
mantras.description: A protective prayer to Lord Narasimha, the man-lion avatar of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ नमो भगवते नरसिंहाय ज्वलन्मुखाय ज्वालामालिने दिप्तदंष्ट्राय भीषणाय॥
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Narasimha with a fiery face, surrounded by flames, with sharp teeth, causing terror to evil.

mantras.title: Arunachala Siva
mantras.description: A devotional song composed by Ramana Maharshi in praise of Lord Arunachala (Shiva)
mantras.text: अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचला। अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचल शिव अरुणाचला॥
mantras.translation: Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala. Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala.

mantras.title: Hanuman Mantra
mantras.description: A powerful mantra dedicated to Lord Hanuman for strength and protection
mantras.text: ॐ हनुमते नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Hanuman.

mantras.title: Narayana Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Narayana (Vishnu)
mantras.text: ॐ नमो नारायणाय
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Narayana.

mantras.title: Subramanya Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Subramanya (Murugan), the son of Lord Shiva
mantras.text: ॐ शरवणभवाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to the one born in a reed forest (Subramanya).

mantras.title: Durga Saptashati Path
mantras.description: A recitation of the Durga Saptashati, a text of 700 verses in praise of Goddess Durga
mantras.text: नमो देव्यै महादेव्यै शिवायै सततं नमः। नमः प्रकृत्यै भद्रायै नियताः प्रणताः स्म ताम्॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to the Devi, the Mahadevi. Salutations always to her who is ever auspicious. Salutations to her who is the primordial cause and the sustaining power. With attention, we bow to her.

mantras.title: Vishnu Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Vishnu, the preserver deity in the Hindu Trinity
mantras.text: ॐ नमो विष्णवे
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Vishnu.

mantras.title: Krishna Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Krishna, an avatar of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ श्री कृष्णाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Krishna.

mantras.title: Lalita Sahasranama
mantras.description: A list of 1,000 names of Goddess Lalita Tripurasundari, a form of Parvati
mantras.text: ॐ श्री माता श्री महाराज्ञी श्रीमत्-सिंहासनेश्वरी। चिदग्नि-कुण्ड-सम्भूता देवकार्य-समुद्यता॥
mantras.translation: Om, She is the Divine Mother, the Great Empress, the Queen of the Divine Throne. She is born from the sacrificial fire of Consciousness, ready to perform the work of the gods.

mantras.title: Ashtavinayak Vandana
mantras.description: A prayer to the eight forms of Lord Ganesha found in the Ashtavinayak pilgrimage circuit
mantras.text: प्रथमं मोरेश्वरं वन्दे चिन्तामणिं द्वितीयकम्। तृतीयं सिद्धिविनायकं वरदं वक्रतुण्डं चतुर्थकम्॥
mantras.translation: First, I bow to Moreshwar, second to Chintamani, third to Siddhi Vinayak, and fourth to Varad Vinayak, the one with the twisted trunk.

mantras.title: Navkar Mantra
mantras.description: The most significant mantra in Jainism, also known as Namokar Mantra
mantras.text: णमो अरिहंताणं णमो सिद्धाणं णमो आयरियाणं णमो उवज्झायाणं णमो लोए सव्वसाहूणं
mantras.translation: I bow to the Arihantas (enlightened beings). I bow to the Siddhas (liberated souls). I bow to the Acharyas (spiritual leaders). I bow to the Upadhyayas (spiritual teachers). I bow to all the Sadhus (monks) in the world.

mantras.title: Shri Kali Navamtrim Siddha Mantra
mantras.description: A powerful nine-syllable mantra dedicated to Goddess Kali
mantras.text: क्रीं क्रीं क्रीं हूं हूं ह्रीं ह्रीं स्वाहा
mantras.translation: Kreem Kreem Kreem Hoom Hoom Hreem Hreem Swaha.

mantras.title: Tara Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Goddess Tara, a form of Shakti
mantras.text: ॐ त्रैं ह्रीं हूम् फट्
mantras.translation: Om Traim Hreem Hum Phat.

mantras.title: Annapurna Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to Goddess Annapurna, a form of Parvati who is the goddess of food and nourishment
mantras.text: नित्यानन्दकरी वराभयकरी सौन्दर्यरत्नाकरी निर्धूताखिलघोरपावनकरी प्रत्यक्षमाहेश्वरी।
mantras.translation: She who gives eternal bliss, who grants boons and dispels fears, who is a treasure of beauty, who purifies from all terrible sins, who is the manifest form of Maheswari (the Great Goddess).

mantras.title: Brahma Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Brahma, the creator in the Hindu Trinity
mantras.text: ॐ ब्रह्मणे नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Brahma.

mantras.title: Indra Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Indra, the king of the gods in the Vedic pantheon
mantras.text: ॐ इन्द्राय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Indra.

mantras.title: Varuna Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Varuna, the Vedic god of water and the celestial ocean
mantras.text: ॐ वरुणाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Varuna.

mantras.title: Agni Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Agni, the Vedic god of fire
mantras.text: ॐ अग्नये नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Agni.

mantras.title: Yama Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Yama, the god of death and justice
mantras.text: ॐ यमाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Yama.

mantras.title: Kubera Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Kubera, the god of wealth and the regent of the North
mantras.text: ॐ कुबेराय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Kubera.

mantras.title: Vayu Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Vayu, the Vedic god of wind
mantras.text: ॐ वायवे नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Vayu.

mantras.title: Niranjana Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to the formless aspect of the Divine
mantras.text: ॐ निरञ्जनाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to the Stainless One.

mantras.title: Vishwamitra Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A variation of the Gayatri Mantra attributed to the sage Vishwamitra
mantras.text: ॐ विश्वामित्राय विद्महे महर्षये धीमहि तन्नो विश्व प्रचोदयात्
mantras.translation: We contemplate the glory of Sage Vishwamitra, the great seer. May he inspire our understanding.

mantras.title: Hiranyagarbha Suktam
mantras.description: A hymn from the Rigveda dedicated to Hiranyagarbha, the golden womb or cosmic egg
mantras.text: हिरण्यगर्भः समवर्तताग्रे भूतस्य जातः पतिरेक आसीत्। स दाधार पृथिवीं द्यामुतेमां कस्मै देवाय हविषा विधेम॥
mantras.translation: In the beginning, Hiranyagarbha (the golden womb) came into being, the one lord of all created beings. He upholds this earth and heaven. Let us worship him with an oblation.

mantras.title: Ishavasya Upanishad
mantras.description: The opening verse of the Ishavasya Upanishad, which emphasizes the omnipresence of the Divine
mantras.text: ईशा वास्यमिदं सर्वं यत्किञ्च जगत्यां जगत्। तेन त्यक्तेन भुञ्जीथा मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम्॥
mantras.translation: All this, whatever exists in this changing universe, should be covered by the Lord. Protect yourself through that detachment. Do not covet anybody's wealth.

mantras.title: Pavamana Abhyaroha
mantras.description: A Vedic hymn of purification
mantras.text: असतो मा सद्गमय। तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय। मृत्योर्मा अमृतं गमय॥
mantras.translation: Lead me from the unreal to the real. Lead me from darkness to light. Lead me from death to immortality.

mantras.title: Shanti Mantra from Brihadaranyaka Upanishad
mantras.description: A peace invocation from the Brihadaranyaka Upanishad
mantras.text: ॐ पूर्णमदः पूर्णमिदं पूर्णात्पूर्णमुदच्यते। पूर्णस्य पूर्णमादाय पूर्णमेवावशिष्यते॥ ॐ शान्तिः शान्तिः शान्तिः॥
mantras.translation: That is whole, this is whole. From wholeness, wholeness comes. If wholeness is taken from wholeness, wholeness still remains. Om peace, peace, peace.

mantras.title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu
mantras.description: A popular verse that extols the glory of the Guru (spiritual teacher)
mantras.text: गुरुर्ब्रह्मा गुरुर्विष्णुः गुरुर्देवो महेश्वरः। गुरुः साक्षात् परब्रह्म तस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः॥
mantras.translation: The Guru is Brahma, the Guru is Vishnu, the Guru is the god Maheshwara (Shiva). The Guru is verily the supreme Brahman. Salutations to that Guru.

mantras.title: Karpura-Gauram Karunavtaram
mantras.description: A hymn to Lord Shiva who is white as camphor and the embodiment of compassion
mantras.text: कर्पूरगौरं करुणावतारं संसारसारं भुजगेन्द्रहारम्। सदा वसन्तं हृदयारविन्दे भवं भवानीसहितं नमामि॥
mantras.translation: I bow to Bhava (Lord Shiva) who is white as camphor, who is the incarnation of compassion, who is the essence of all worldly existence, who wears the king of serpents as a garland, who always resides in the lotus of the heart, along with Bhavani (Goddess Parvati).

mantras.title: Kalabhairava Ashtakam
mantras.description: An eight-verse hymn dedicated to Kalabhairava, a fierce manifestation of Lord Shiva
mantras.text: देवराज-सेव्यमान-पावनाङ्घ्रि-पङ्कजं व्यालयज्ञ-सूत्रमिन्दु-शेखरं कृपाकरम्। नारदादि-योगि-वृन्द-वन्दितं दिगम्बरं काशिकापुराधिनाथ-कालभैरवं भजे॥
mantras.translation: I worship Kalabhairava, the lord of Kashi, whose lotus feet are served by Indra, who wears a serpent as his sacred thread, who bears the moon on his forehead, who is the embodiment of compassion, who is adored by Narada and other yogis, and who is clothed in the directions (i.e., naked).

mantras.title: Siddheshvari Stotra
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to Goddess Siddheshvari, a form of the Divine Mother
mantras.text: नमो देवि महामाये सिद्धे शिवे शिवङ्करि। नित्ये त्वं नित्यरूपे च नित्यं पूजा नमोऽस्तु ते॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to the Goddess, the great Maya, the accomplished one, the auspicious one, the maker of auspiciousness. You are eternal, of eternal form, and I eternally worship you. Salutations to you.

mantras.title: Aditya Hridayam (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn to the Sun God as narrated by sage Agastya to Lord Rama
mantras.text: ततो युद्धपरिश्रान्तं समरे चिन्तया स्थितम्। रावणं चाग्रतो दृष्ट्वा युद्धाय समुपस्थितम्॥
mantras.translation: Seeing Rama exhausted in the battle and Ravana standing in front ready for the fight, the great sage Agastya narrated this hymn to Rama.

mantras.title: Lakshmi Stuti
mantras.description: A hymn in praise of Goddess Lakshmi from the Vishnu Purana
mantras.text: नमस्ते सर्वलोकानां जननि त्वां श्रियं प्रभो। त्वां हिरण्मयीं लक्ष्मीं सुप्रसन्नां नमाम्यहम्॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to you, O Mother of all worlds, I salute you, O Goddess of Fortune, the golden Lakshmi, be pleased with me.

mantras.title: Narayana Kavacham
mantras.description: A protective prayer to Lord Narayana from the Bhagavata Purana
mantras.text: ओं नमो नारायणाय पुरुषाय महात्मने विशुद्धसत्वधिष्ण्याय महाहंसाय धीमहि॥
mantras.translation: Om, let us meditate on Lord Narayana, the Supreme Being, the Great Soul, the abode of pure existence, the Great Swan.

mantras.title: Kala Bhairava Ashtakam
mantras.description: Another version of the eight-verse hymn dedicated to Kalabhairava
mantras.text: वटुकं चण्डभैरवं भज रे भज रे मनो हरं चण्डभैरवम्। सुरवरैः सुपूजितं सुरवरैः सुवन्दितं भज रे भज रे मनो हरं चण्डभैरवम्॥
mantras.translation: O mind, worship Chandabhairava, the young lord. Worship Chandabhairava, the captivating one. He is worshiped and adored by the best of gods. O mind, worship Chandabhairava, the captivating one.

mantras.title: Ram Raksha Stotram (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete protective prayer to Lord Rama
mantras.text: श्रीरामरक्षास्तोत्रं भजतां कामदं सदा। साप्तर्ष्यमुखनिर्याताया महेश्वरप्रसादिताम्॥
mantras.translation: This Rama Raksha Stotra always fulfills the desires of those who recite it. It emerged from the mouth of the seven sages and was blessed by Lord Shiva.

mantras.title: Ganga Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn in praise of the River Ganges
mantras.text: देवि सुरेश्वरि भगवति गङ्गे त्रिभुवनतारिणि तरलतरङ्गे। शङ्करमौलिविहारिणि विमले मम मतिरास्तां तव पदकमले॥
mantras.translation: O Goddess Ganga, the queen of the gods, the savior of the three worlds, with your rippling waves, sporting in the matted locks of Shiva, O pure one, may my mind be fixed on your lotus feet.

mantras.title: Narasimha Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn in praise of Lord Narasimha, the man-lion avatar of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ उग्रं वीरं महाविष्णुं ज्वलन्तं सर्वतोमुखम्। नृसिंहं भीषणं भद्रं मृत्युमृत्युं नमाम्यहम्॥
mantras.translation: I bow to the fierce, heroic, great Vishnu, who is blazing and has faces in all directions; to the man-lion, who is terrifying yet auspicious, the death of death itself.

mantras.title: Ganesha Pancharatnam (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete five-verse hymn dedicated to Lord Ganesha
mantras.text: मुदाकरात्त मोदकं सदा विमुक्ति साधकम् कलाधराव तंसकं विलासि लोक रक्षकम्।
mantras.translation: I bow to the lotus-feet of Ganesha, who holds a modaka (sweet) in his hand, who is the bestower of liberation, who wears the moon on his forehead, and who protects the world.

mantras.title: Vishnu Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ नारायणाय विद्महे वासुदेवाय धीमहि तन्नो विष्णुः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Lord Narayana, we contemplate on Vasudeva. May that Vishnu illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Valmiki Ramayana Sloka
mantras.description: The first verse of the Ramayana composed by Valmiki
mantras.text: तपः स्वाध्यायनिरतां तपस्वी वाग्विदां वरम्। नारदं परिपप्रच्छ वाल्मीकिर्मुनिपुङ्गवम्॥
mantras.translation: Valmiki, the eminent sage, devoted to penance and study, inquired of Narada, the best among those skilled in speech, and eminent among sages.

mantras.title: Shuka Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Shuka, the son of Vyasa
mantras.text: ॐ शुकदेवाय विद्महे व्यासपुत्राय धीमहि तन्नो शुकः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Shukadeva, we contemplate on the son of Vyasa. May that Shuka illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Kali Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Goddess Kali, the fierce form of Shakti
mantras.text: ॐ क्रीं कालिकायै नमः
mantras.translation: Om Kreem, salutations to Goddess Kali.

mantras.title: Bhavani Ashtakam
mantras.description: An eight-verse hymn dedicated to Goddess Bhavani (Parvati)
mantras.text: न तातो न माता न बन्धुर्न दाता न पुत्रो न पुत्री न भृत्यो न भर्ता। न जाया न विद्या न वृत्तिर्ममैव गतिस्त्वं गतिस्त्वं त्वमेका भवानि॥
mantras.translation: I have no father, no mother, no kinsman, no giver, no son, no daughter, no servant, no husband, no wife, no learning, no profession. You alone are my refuge, you alone are my refuge, O Bhavani.

mantras.title: Devi Kavacham
mantras.description: A protective prayer to the Goddess from the Devi Mahatmyam
mantras.text: शिरो मे देवि चण्डिका सर्वं रक्षतु सर्वदा। भालं मे भद्रकाली च नेत्रे रक्षतु चोमया॥
mantras.translation: May the Goddess Chandika always protect my head. May Bhadrakali protect my forehead, and may Umaya protect my eyes.

mantras.title: Dattatreya Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Dattatreya, the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva
mantras.text: ॐ दिगम्बराय विद्महे अत्रिपुत्राय धीमहि तन्नो दत्तः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the One who is clothed in the directions (naked), we contemplate on the son of Atri. May that Datta illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Sita Ram Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra that invokes Lord Rama and Goddess Sita together
mantras.text: ॐ श्री सीतारामचंद्राभ्यां नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Shri Sita and Lord Ramachandra.

mantras.title: Ganesh Atharvashirsha
mantras.description: A Upanishadic text dedicated to Lord Ganesha
mantras.text: ॐ नमस्ते गणपतये। त्वमेव प्रत्यक्षं तत्त्वमसि। त्वमेव केवलं कर्तारम् असि। त्वमेव केवलं धर्तारम् असि। त्वमेव केवलं हर्तारम् असि॥
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Ganapati. You alone are the manifest principle. You alone are the creator. You alone are the sustainer. You alone are the destroyer.

mantras.title: Shiva Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Shiva
mantras.text: ॐ तत्पुरुषाय विद्महे महादेवाय धीमहि तन्नो रुद्रः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on that Purusha, we contemplate on the great god. May that Rudra illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Shiva Tandava Stotram (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn that describes the dance of Lord Shiva
mantras.text: जटाटवीगलज्जलप्रवाहपावितस्थले गलेऽवलम्ब्य लम्बितां भुजङ्गतुङ्गमालिकाम्।
mantras.translation: With his neck, which is being sanctified by the flow of water from the forest-like matted locks, where the serpents, raised high, adorn like a garland.

mantras.title: Durga Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Goddess Durga
mantras.text: ॐ कात्यायनाय विद्महे कन्याकुमारि धीमहि तन्नो दुर्गिः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Katyayani, we contemplate on the virgin goddess. May that Durga illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Lakshmi Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi
mantras.text: ॐ महादेव्यै च विद्महे विष्णुपत्न्यै च धीमहि तन्नो लक्ष्मीः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the great goddess, we contemplate on the consort of Vishnu. May that Lakshmi illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Saraswati Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Goddess Saraswati
mantras.text: ॐ वागदेव्यै च विद्महे वरदायै च धीमहि तन्नो देवी प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the goddess of speech, we contemplate on the bestower of boons. May that goddess illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Hanuman Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Hanuman
mantras.text: ॐ आञ्जनेयाय विद्महे वायुपुत्राय धीमहि तन्नो हनुमान् प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Anjaneya, we contemplate on the son of Vayu. May that Hanuman illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Krishna Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Krishna
mantras.text: ॐ देवकीनन्दनाय विद्महे वासुदेवाय धीमहि तन्नो कृष्णः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the son of Devaki, we contemplate on Vasudeva. May that Krishna illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Ganesha Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Ganesha
mantras.text: ॐ एकदन्ताय विद्महे वक्रतुण्डाय धीमहि तन्नो दन्तिः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the one-tusked one, we contemplate on the one with the curved trunk. May that tusked one illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Rama Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Rama
mantras.text: ॐ दाशरथाय विद्महे सीतावल्लभाय धीमहि तन्नो रामः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the son of Dasharatha, we contemplate on the beloved of Sita. May that Rama illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Hayagriva Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Hayagriva, the horse-headed avatar of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ हयग्रीवाय विद्महे वाक्पतये धीमहि तन्नो हयः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Hayagriva, we contemplate on the lord of speech. May that horse-headed one illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Ketu Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Ketu, one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ केतवे नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Ketu.

mantras.title: Rahu Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Rahu, one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ राहवे नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Rahu.

mantras.title: Shani Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Shani (Saturn), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ शनैश्चराय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Shani.

mantras.title: Budha Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Budha (Mercury), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ बुधाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Budha (Mercury).

mantras.title: Guru (Jupiter) Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Guru (Jupiter), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ बृहस्पतये नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Brihaspati (Jupiter).

mantras.title: Mangala (Mars) Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Mangala (Mars), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ अङ्गारकाय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Angaraka (Mars).

mantras.title: Shukra (Venus) Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Shukra (Venus), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ शुक्राय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Shukra (Venus).

mantras.title: Chandra (Moon) Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Chandra (Moon), one of the nine planets in Hindu astrology
mantras.text: ॐ चन्द्राय नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Chandra (Moon).

mantras.title: Sundara Kanda
mantras.description: A section from the Ramayana that narrates Hanuman's journey to Lanka
mantras.text: अथ रावणनीतायाः सीतायाः शत्रुकर्शनः। अशोकवनिकामध्ये वृक्षमूलगतो ह्यभूत्॥
mantras.translation: Then, the tormentor of enemies (Hanuman) reached the foot of a tree in the middle of the Ashoka forest where Sita was kept after being abducted by Ravana.

mantras.title: Purusha Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to the cosmic person
mantras.text: ॐ तत्पुरुषाय विद्महे सहस्राक्षाय धीमहि तन्नो पुरुषः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on that Purusha, we contemplate on the thousand-eyed one. May that Purusha illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Brahma Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Lord Brahma
mantras.text: ॐ वेदात्मनाय विद्महे हिरण्यगर्भाय धीमहि तन्नो ब्रह्मा प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the soul of the Vedas, we contemplate on Hiranyagarbha. May that Brahma illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Panduranga Ashtakam
mantras.description: An eight-verse hymn dedicated to Lord Panduranga (Vitthal), a form of Vishnu
mantras.text: पाण्डुरङ्गाष्टकं पुण्यं यः पठेद्भक्तिभावतः। तस्य तुष्टो हरिः साक्षात् ददाति परमं पदम्॥
mantras.translation: Whoever recites this sacred Panduranga Ashtakam with devotion, Lord Hari becomes pleased with them and gives them the supreme state.

mantras.title: Venkatesh Ashtakam
mantras.description: An eight-verse hymn dedicated to Lord Venkateshwara, a form of Vishnu
mantras.text: वेङ्कटेश्वराष्टकं पुण्यं यः पठेच्छृणुयादपि। सर्वापराधनिर्मुक्तो विष्णुलोकं स गच्छति॥
mantras.translation: Whoever recites or hears this sacred Venkateshwara Ashtakam, becomes free from all sins and goes to the abode of Vishnu.

mantras.title: Naga Panchami Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra recited during the Naga Panchami festival dedicated to serpent deities
mantras.text: नागस्य दर्शनं पुण्यं नागस्य श्रवणं तथा। नागस्य कीर्तनं विष्णुसायुज्यफलप्रदम्॥
mantras.translation: The sight of the Naga is auspicious, so is hearing about the Naga. Singing the praise of Naga bestows the fruit of becoming one with Vishnu.

mantras.title: Dhanvantari Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra dedicated to Lord Dhanvantari, the god of Ayurveda
mantras.text: ॐ नमो भगवते महासुदर्शनाय वासुदेवाय धन्वन्तरये। अमृतकलश हस्ताय सर्वभयविनाशाय सर्वरोगनिवारणाय त्रैलोक्यपतये त्रैलोक्यनिधये श्रीमहाविष्णुस्वरूपाय श्रीदनवन्तरिस्वरूपाय श्रीश्रीश्रीऔषधचक्रनारायणाय नमः॥
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to the Lord Sudarshana, Vasudeva, Dhanvantari, who holds the pot of nectar in his hand, who destroys all fears, who cures all diseases, who is the lord of the three worlds, the treasure of the three worlds, who is the form of Maha Vishnu, who is the form of Dhanvantari, who is the form of the medicine Chakra Narayana.

mantras.title: Nataraja Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to Lord Nataraja, the dancing form of Shiva
mantras.text: नृत्यावसाने नटराजराजो ननाद ढक्कां नवपञ्चवारम्। उद्धर्तुकामस्सनकादिसिद्धानेतद्विमर्शे शिवसूत्रजालम्॥
mantras.translation: At the end of his dance, King Nataraja sounded his drum nine times. For the sake of uplifting sages like Sanaka and others, he created this network of Shiva Sutras for their contemplation.

mantras.title: Yogendra Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to the lord of yoga
mantras.text: ॐ योगीन्द्राय विद्महे तत्त्वज्ञानाय धीमहि तन्नो योगी प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the lord of yoga, we contemplate on the knower of truth. May that yogi illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Matsya Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Matsya, the fish incarnation of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ मत्स्यरूपाय विद्महे हेमाङ्गाय धीमहि तन्नो मत्स्यः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the fish form, we contemplate on the golden-bodied one. May that Matsya illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Kurma Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Kurma, the tortoise incarnation of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ कूर्मरूपाय विद्महे हेमाङ्गाय धीमहि तन्नः कूर्मः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the tortoise form, we contemplate on the golden-bodied one. May that Kurma illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Varaha Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Varaha, the boar incarnation of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ वराहरूपाय विद्महे हेमाङ्गाय धीमहि तन्नो वराहः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the boar form, we contemplate on the golden-bodied one. May that Varaha illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Vamana Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Vamana, the dwarf incarnation of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ वामनाय विद्महे विष्णवे धीमहि तन्नो वामनः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Vamana, we contemplate on Vishnu. May that Vamana illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Parashurama Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Parashurama, an incarnation of Vishnu
mantras.text: ॐ भार्गवाय विद्महे महावीराय धीमहि तन्नः परशुः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the son of Bhrigu, we contemplate on the great hero. May that Parashu (axe) illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Dakshinamurthy Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Dakshinamurthy, a form of Shiva as the supreme teacher
mantras.text: ॐ दक्षिणामूर्तये विद्महे विद्यागुरवे धीमहि तन्नो मूर्तिः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on Dakshinamurthy, we contemplate on the teacher of knowledge. May that form illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Sai Baba Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Sai Baba of Shirdi
mantras.text: ॐ साईश्वराय विद्महे सत्यदेवाय धीमहि तन्नः सर्वः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the lord Sai, we contemplate on the true god. May that Sarva (all) illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Satya Narayana Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to Lord Satya Narayana, a form of Vishnu
mantras.text: नमस्तुभ्यं भगवते वासुदेवाय धीमहि। प्रद्युम्नायानिरुद्धाय नमः सङ्कर्षणाय च॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to you, O Lord Vasudeva, we contemplate on you. Salutations to Pradyumna, Aniruddha, and Sankarshana.

mantras.title: Guru Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to the spiritual teacher
mantras.text: गुरुर्ब्रह्मा गुरुर्विष्णुर्गुरुर्देवो महेश्वरः। गुरुः साक्षात् परं ब्रह्म तस्मै श्री गुरवे नमः॥
mantras.translation: The Guru is Brahma, the Guru is Vishnu, the Guru is Lord Maheshwara. The Guru is verily the supreme Brahman. Salutations to that Guru.

mantras.title: Yaksha Prashna
mantras.description: The questions and answers between Yudhishthira and Yaksha from the Mahabharata
mantras.text: किं स्विदाश्चर्यतमं लोके राजन्निति। यक्ष, अहन्यहनि भूतानि गच्छन्तीह यमालयम्। शेषाः स्थावरमिच्छन्ति किमाश्चर्यमतः परम्॥
mantras.translation: Yaksha: What is the most wonderful thing in the world, O king? Yudhishthira: Day after day, countless beings enter the abode of Yama (die), yet those who remain behind believe they are immortal. What can be more wonderful than this?

mantras.title: Hari Nama Sankirtana
mantras.description: A devotional chant of the names of Lord Hari (Vishnu)
mantras.text: हरे राम हरे राम राम राम हरे हरे। हरे कृष्ण हरे कृष्ण कृष्ण कृष्ण हरे हरे॥
mantras.translation: O divine energy (Hare), O all-attractive one (Rama), O all-attractive one (Rama), O all-attractive one (Rama), O divine energy (Hare), O divine energy (Hare). O divine energy (Hare), O all-attractive one (Krishna), O all-attractive one (Krishna), O all-attractive one (Krishna), O divine energy (Hare), O divine energy (Hare).

mantras.title: Ekadasi Vrata Katha
mantras.description: The story of the Ekadasi fast as narrated in the Puranas
mantras.text: एकादशी व्रतं पुण्यं सर्वपापप्रणाशनम्। करोति मोक्षदं नॄणां तस्मात्तत्सर्वदाचरेत्॥
mantras.translation: The Ekadasi vow is meritorious, destroys all sins, and bestows liberation upon humans. Therefore, one should always observe it.

mantras.title: Aum Dhyanam
mantras.description: A meditation on the sacred syllable Aum
mantras.text: प्रणवोऽसि प्रणवो ब्रह्म प्रणवो विश्वतो मुखः। प्रणवो विश्वरूपोऽसि प्रणवात्परतः परः॥
mantras.translation: You are the Pranava (Aum), Pranava is Brahman, Pranava faces in all directions. You are the universal form of Pranava, beyond Pranava, and the highest of the high.

mantras.title: Brahma Sutra
mantras.description: The opening verse of the Brahma Sutra, a foundational text of Vedanta philosophy
mantras.text: अथातो ब्रह्मजिज्ञासा
mantras.translation: Now, therefore, the inquiry into Brahman.

mantras.title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1, Verse 1
mantras.description: The opening verse of the Bhagavad Gita
mantras.text: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच। धर्मक्षेत्रे कुरुक्षेत्रे समवेता युयुत्सवः। मामकाः पाण्डवाश्चैव किमकुर्वत सञ्जय॥
mantras.translation: Dhritarashtra said: O Sanjaya, after gathering on the holy field of Kurukshetra, and being desirous to fight, what did my sons and the sons of Pandu do?

mantras.title: Bhishma Stuti
mantras.description: A hymn of praise to Bhishma from the Mahabharata
mantras.text: नमो धर्माय महते नमः कृष्णाय वेधसे। ब्राह्मणेभ्यो नमस्कृत्य धर्मः सम्यक् प्रवर्तते॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to the great Dharma, salutations to Krishna, the Creator. After paying respects to the Brahmanas, Dharma functions properly.

mantras.title: Dhruva Stuti
mantras.description: A hymn of praise by the child devotee Dhruva to Lord Vishnu
mantras.text: यो अन्तः प्रविश्य मम वाचमिमां प्रसुप्तां सञ्जीवयत्यखिलशक्तिधरः स्वधाम्ना। अन्यांश्च हस्तचरणश्रवणत्वगादीन् प्राणान् नमो भगवते पुरुषाय तुभ्यम्॥
mantras.translation: I offer my obeisances unto the Supreme Personality of Godhead who has entered within me and who, by His own potency, awakens my dormant speech and other senses such as hands, legs, ears, and skin.

mantras.title: Prahlada Stuti
mantras.description: A hymn of praise by the child devotee Prahlada to Lord Vishnu
mantras.text: प्रह्लाद उवाच। ब्रह्माद्याः सुरगणा मुनयोऽथ सिद्धाः सत्त्वैकतानगतयो वचसां प्रवाहैः। नारा॑धितुं पुरुगुणैरधुनापि पिप्रुः किं तोष्टुमर्हति स मे हरिरुग्रजातेः॥
mantras.translation: Prahlada said: Brahma, the demigods, the sages, and the Siddhas, with their minds fixed on the mode of goodness, have not yet been able to satisfy the Lord with the streams of their words, despite possessing many good qualities. How then can I, born of a demoniac family, please Lord Hari?

mantras.title: Bhumi Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to Mother Earth
mantras.text: ॐ भूमिदेव्यै विद्महे अनन्ताय धीमहि तन्नो भूमिः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the goddess Earth, we contemplate on the infinite one. May that Earth illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Tulasi Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn dedicated to the sacred Tulasi plant
mantras.text: वृन्दावनी तुलसी अमृतजन्मा जयति जयति माधवरमणा जयति जयति॥
mantras.translation: Victory, victory to the Tulasi of Vrindavana, born of nectar, beloved of Madhava (Krishna), victory, victory to her!

mantras.title: Hamsa Gayatri Mantra
mantras.description: A Gayatri Mantra dedicated to the Hamsa (swan or supreme soul)
mantras.text: ॐ हंसाय विद्महे परमहंसाय धीमहि तन्नो हंसः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.translation: We meditate on the swan, we contemplate on the supreme swan. May that swan illuminate our minds.

mantras.title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 15, Verse 15
mantras.description: A key verse from the Bhagavad Gita on the knowledge of the Supreme
mantras.text: सर्वस्य चाहं हृदि सन्निविष्टो मत्तः स्मृतिर्ज्ञानमपोहनं च। वेदैश्च सर्वैरहमेव वेद्यो वेदान्तकृद्वेदविदेव चाहम्॥
mantras.translation: I am seated in everyone's heart, and from Me come remembrance, knowledge and forgetfulness. By all the Vedas, I am to be known. Indeed, I am the compiler of Vedanta, and I am the knower of the Vedas.

mantras.title: Veda Vyasa Stuti
mantras.description: A hymn in praise of Veda Vyasa, the compiler of the Vedas
mantras.text: व्यासाय विष्णुरूपाय व्यासरूपाय विष्णवे। नमो वै ब्रह्मनिधये वासिष्ठाय नमो नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to Vyasa, who is in the form of Vishnu, and to Vishnu, who is in the form of Vyasa. Salutations to the repository of Brahman, to the descendant of Vasishtha, salutations, salutations.

mantras.title: Kanaka Dhara Stotram (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn composed by Adi Shankaracharya for the prosperity of a poor woman
mantras.text: अङ्गं हरेः पुलकभूषणमाश्रयन्ती भृङ्गाङ्गनेव मुकुलाभरणं तमालम्।
mantras.translation: She who resides on the body of Lord Vishnu, adorning it with her joyous presence, like a female bee adorning a blooming Tamala tree.

mantras.title: Lalita Trishati
mantras.description: A hymn of 300 names of Goddess Lalita
mantras.text: ॐ ऐं ह्रीं श्रीं श्री ललितापरमेश्वर्यै नमः
mantras.translation: Om Aim Hreem Shreem, salutations to Shri Lalita Parameshwari.

mantras.title: Narada Bhakti Sutra
mantras.description: The opening verses of the Narada Bhakti Sutra, a text on devotion composed by sage Narada
mantras.text: अथातो भक्तिं व्याख्यास्यामः। सा त्वस्मिन् परमप्रेमरूपा। अमृतस्वरूपा च॥
mantras.translation: Now, therefore, I shall explain devotion. It is of the nature of supreme love for God. It is also of the nature of immortal bliss.

mantras.title: Taraka Mantra
mantras.description: A liberating mantra that helps in crossing the ocean of worldly existence
mantras.text: ॐ नमो नारायणाय
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to Lord Narayana.

mantras.title: Guru Paduka Stotram
mantras.description: A hymn in praise of the sandals of the spiritual teacher
mantras.text: अनेकजन्मार्जितपापसंक्षयो भवेद्यदीयांघ्रिसरोजरेणुना। पुनाति मन्त्रः सकृदुच्चरितः श्रुतौ कथं नु तस्याब्जयुगं विना नृणाम्॥
mantras.translation: The dust of whose lotus feet destroys the sins accumulated over many births, and whose mantra, when uttered just once, purifies according to the scriptures. How can humans be purified without the pair of lotus feet (sandals) of such a guru?

mantras.title: Kubera Mantra (Extended)
mantras.description: An extended mantra dedicated to Lord Kubera for wealth and prosperity
mantras.text: ॐ याक्षाय कुबेराय वैश्रवणाय धनधान्यादिपतये धनधान्यसमृद्धिं मे देहि दापय स्वाहा॥
mantras.translation: Om, to the yaksha Kubera, to Vaishravana, to the lord of wealth and grains, grant me and bestow upon me abundance of wealth and grains, svaha.

mantras.title: Chandi Path
mantras.description: A recitation from the Devi Mahatmyam, also known as Chandi Path
mantras.text: ॐ ऐं ह्रीं क्लीं चामुण्डायै विच्चे
mantras.translation: Om Aim Hreem Kleem, to Chamunda, Vicche (cut the bondage).

mantras.title: Saptashloki Durga
mantras.description: A seven-verse hymn dedicated to Goddess Durga
mantras.text: ज्ञानिनामपि चेतांसि देवी भगवती हि सा। बलादाकृष्य मोहाय महामाया प्रयच्छति॥
mantras.translation: That Goddess, the great Maya, forcibly attracts the minds of even the wise and plunges them into delusion.

mantras.title: Siva Sankalpam
mantras.description: A hymn for auspicious resolve from the Yajurveda
mantras.text: यज्जाग्रतो दूरमुदैति दैवं तदु सुप्तस्य तथैवैति। दूरङ्गमं ज्योतिषां ज्योतिरेकं तन्मे मनः शिवसङ्कल्पमस्तु॥
mantras.translation: That which travels far when one is awake and similarly travels far when one is asleep, the one light that travels far among the lights, may my mind be of auspicious resolve.

mantras.title: Shiva Mahimna Stotra (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn in praise of the greatness of Lord Shiva
mantras.text: महिम्नः पारं ते परमविदुषो यद्यसदृशी स्तुतिर्ब्रह्मादीनामपि तदवसन्नास्त्वयि गिरः।
mantras.translation: If even the greatest scholars cannot fully comprehend the extent of your glory, if the praises sung by Brahma and other gods are inadequate, then what can my words do?

mantras.title: Shri Rudram
mantras.description: A Vedic hymn dedicated to Rudra (Shiva) from the Yajurveda
mantras.text: नमस्ते रुद्र मन्यव उतोत इषवे नमः। नमस्ते अस्तु धन्वने बाहुभ्यामुत ते नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to Rudra who is in the form of anger, and to your arrow, salutations. Salutations to your bow, and to your arms, salutations.

mantras.title: Vishnu Sahasranama (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn of the thousand names of Lord Vishnu
mantras.text: विश्वं विष्णुर्वषट्कारो भूतभव्यभवत्प्रभुः। भूतकृद्भूतभृद्भावो भूतात्मा भूतभावनः॥
mantras.translation: Vishnu is the universe, He is the utterance of Vashat (the sacred sacrificial chant), He is the Lord of past, present, and future, He is the creator and sustainer of beings, He is the soul of all beings, He is the cause of all beings.

mantras.title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 18, Verse 66
mantras.description: A key verse from the Bhagavad Gita on surrender to the Divine
mantras.text: सर्वधर्मान्परित्यज्य मामेकं शरणं व्रज। अहं त्वा सर्वपापेभ्यो मोक्षयिष्यामि मा शुचः॥
mantras.translation: Abandon all varieties of dharma and simply surrender unto Me. I shall deliver you from all sinful reactions. Do not fear.

mantras.title: Upanishad Mantras
mantras.description: A collection of key mantras from the Upanishads
mantras.text: अहं ब्रह्मास्मि। तत्त्वमसि। प्रज्ञानं ब्रह्म। अयमात्मा ब्रह्म॥
mantras.translation: I am Brahman. That thou art. Consciousness is Brahman. This Self is Brahman.

mantras.title: Maha Ganapati Mantra
mantras.description: A powerful mantra dedicated to Lord Ganesha
mantras.text: ॐ श्री महागणपतये नमः
mantras.translation: Om, salutations to the great Lord Ganesha.

mantras.title: Mahamrityunjaya Mantra (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete life-giving mantra dedicated to Lord Shiva
mantras.text: ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम् उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्
mantras.translation: We worship the three-eyed Lord (Shiva) who is fragrant and who nourishes all beings. May He liberate us from the bondage of death, like a cucumber is severed from its bondage (to the creeper). May we be set free for the sake of immortality.

mantras.title: Shodashi Mantra
mantras.description: A sixteen-syllable mantra dedicated to the Divine Mother
mantras.text: ॐ ऐं ह्रीं श्रीं क्लीं सौः ॐ
mantras.translation: Om Aim Hreem Shreem Kleem Sauh Om.

mantras.title: Navagraha Shanti Mantra
mantras.description: A mantra for peace and harmonization of the nine planets
mantras.text: आदित्याय च सोमाय मङ्गलाय बुधाय च। गुरुशुक्रशनिभ्यश्च राहवे केतवे नमः॥
mantras.translation: Salutations to Aditya (Sun), Soma (Moon), Mangala (Mars), Budha (Mercury), Guru (Jupiter), Shukra (Venus), Shani (Saturn), Rahu, and Ketu.

mantras.title: Ashta Lakshmi Stotram (Full Version)
mantras.description: The complete hymn to the eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi
mantras.text: आदिलक्ष्मीर्धनलक्ष्मीर्धान्यलक्ष्मीः कृपावती। गजलक्ष्मीर्ऐश्वर्यलक्ष्मीः सन्तानलक्ष्मीर्विजयलक्ष्मीश्च॥
mantras.translation: Adi Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhanya Lakshmi, Kripavati (the compassionate one), Gaja Lakshmi, Aishwarya Lakshmi, Santana Lakshmi, and Vijaya Lakshmi.
